feed.title: Cleanuparr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Readarr support by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/191

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.5...v2.0.6

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix autocomplete input on mobile phones by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/196

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.6...v2.0.7

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add download client name on debug logs by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/207
  • Improve deploy workflows by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/206
  • Add date on dashboard logs and events by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/205
  • Fix cron expression inputs by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/203

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.7...v2.0.8

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.9
entry.content:

  • Add curl to the Docker image by @Flaminel in https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/pull/211

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr/compare/v2.0.8...v2.0.9

entry.title: New release for Cleanuparr: Cleanuparr v2.0.10
entry.content:
What's Changed
